topic.title: How much do independent programmers like Nofish earn?
topic.body: I'm curious how much people who do these kinds of projects make. Zeronet, Fopnu(from the maker or Tixati and Winmx), etc. I mean, here they have these intercontinental platforms connecting thousands of people. Are they rolling in cash?

topic.title: Censorship on Zerotalk????
topic.body: There is a thread titled "Nigger hate thread". I noticed after I posted on it that it didn't update its position to the top of the list and thought it queer. Now, I see it has been commented on multiple times since then, the latest eight hours ago and yet on my Zeronet homepage, it lists the last update as having been one day ago. Meanwhile, within the Zerotalk zite, it is properly listed as eight hours ago. Thread suppression? Conspiracy? Aliens? You decide!

1565095300_1PnHUGmQkYq4NKZBxFp8o1Wb1ZZij.body:
White guy from the U.S. here. Came to China a decade ago and never left. 

Fuck Hong Kong. A bunch of liberal faggot kids that don't know their dicks from their assholes. China is great, you can do whatever the fuck you want; just don't cause trouble. These Hong Kong faggots are going to all be arrested and have to call mom and dad to come get them out of jail. 8====>

> [h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm](#comment_598_1CKTRBy9N4RvE3FgeZJpQqFYtLHc37yo11): h3bhkj5gqz4n3pjm

Not bad. Where I live, population over 15 million, things are a bit slow. People go to work, take care of their kids, go out to a bar to have a drink with friends or whatever. It's like small town America, but people generally keep their bullshit to themselves instead of making a cause out of everything like back home. Maybe Shanghai or Shenzhen is more exciting but I haven't made it out that way yet.

It's a good place to have a family, though. I remember going out with friends one night and getting a bit drunker than I'd care to be. On the way back, I cut through an unlit small alley. Now remember, this is in the center of a city that rivals New York or Los Angeles in size. Anyway, up ahead there was a group of guys in black leather jackets smoking. So, I'm thinking to myself that they'll probably cause some trouble with me the lone white guy walking drunk as hell pass them. I get up to near them and one turns to me and makes eye contact, smiles and lets out a half assed hello. I wave and smile as I walk by and they all start laughing. Seriously the safest place you'll ever go. No melon munchers nor bean biters. I love it here, but that's just my experience. Some people come and don't care for it.

> [watteau](#comment_3_1AM6ZY48ErJLzU89E7wPVjxoqyWuFnk33o): The protesters are very brave and have scored some sort of victory [...]

If you give a leftist even an inch, they double down in their rabidity. Despite how the Western media makes it sound, China isn't North Korea. Hell, I've never been so I don't even know if North Korea is really like that. But I sure as hell know what life is like in China and it really isn't bad at all. Boring? Maybe. Orwellian? Hell no. All of this nonsense about protecting their rights and such is fabricated horse-shit. 

If you lead a movement of jackasses blocking businesses and the rest of the majority sane population from living their lives, you are a problem and not a solution. All they will accomplish is forcing China's hand like with Xinjiang. Is that what Hong Kongers want for themselves? Definitely not. 

Stop the shit, get a job, find a girl, have some kids and carry on. There's no boogeyman except for the one they'll make for themselves.

> [hdidnothingwrong](#comment_4_1LW31sbmLZebhhgTx2bhzeUNYbZ5cYnBfe): There are numerous ways of getting in trouble in China.  A lot of people resent westeners a hatred which is fed by almost every movie that the government produces. [...]

So full of shit. Man, I've been here ten years. My wife is Chinese, my two sons are Chinese. I speak fluent Chinese. I've dealt with Chinese police and government workers on so many fucking occasions. You are a liar and a piece of shit. Do your part to make the world a better place and jump off a high place.

> [hdidnothingwrong](#comment_6_1LW31sbmLZebhhgTx2bhzeUNYbZ5cYnBfe): Sorry to hear that. [...]

Lawl, you're a comedic genius. 

And yes, I can comment on where specifically you are spreading disinformation:

"There are numerous ways of getting in trouble in China. A lot of people resent westeners a hatred which is fed by almost every movie that the government produces."

There are numerous ways of getting in trouble in any country, it's called breaking the law. A lot of losers from the West come here and think they should be treated as some type of royalty because of their misconception of China as a poor country. This jackasses think they can go around smoking joints and working illegally and then are so shocked to find out that China doesn't need to put up with their shit.

"In the nightclub scene a lot of Chinese hate westeners for taking the prettiest women. They'll approach you offer to buy you drinks and when you are quite drunk, then they'll kick the shit out of you."

Most Chinese women I see with foreigners in clubs are ugly skanks, like the white trash that date black guys. No one is jealous. I've watched another American guy come into a club drunk as hell and started trying to hit on some guy's girl. The guy asked us to handle him and we told him to calm down. He kept making an ass of himself and the dude knocked him across the face. What a poor Westerner, the Chinaman should have just let himself be cucked, right? Faggot. Also, offering you free drinks? Those evil fucks.


"Then there is the government and the police themselves. They're behind most of the crimes. If you displease somebody in government, for any reason, they can make life very hard for you. The authorities themselves will vandalize your property, kill your pet, etc. The Communist system has no feedback mechanism so there is no where to complain."

I don't even know how to reply to this bullshit. With the club thing, at-least I had some basis of understanding where you could be coming from. This is straight up pulled from someone's ass.

"If you want to communicate with others, all communications are heavily monitored by state agencies. If you go to church and make friends there, the government will be deciding who you are allowed to be friends with and what you can talk about. If they don't like who you are talking to they'll block all telephone or chat communication."

Yeah, it's terrible. A government monitoring their people's online activities. No Western government would ever do some shit like that... *cough.... As for deciding who you are friends with, more poorly written fanfiction on your part. People here are friends with whomever they choose to be friends with. I have friends on all political spectra, even some Chinese who disagree with the government.  :O < (that's me making a shocked face). If you've been arrested for causing public disturbances, yeah, I could imagine you being kept from social media. But fuck those people anyway.

"China is not a good place. If you stay there long enough, you'll realize that."

Yeah, ten years here. A buddy of mine has been here fifteen. All I've realized in that time is that a lot, not the majority mind you, but a lot of faggot foreigners that come here seem to think they are owed something by China and its people. When they realize Chinese men and women aren't just waiting to be cucked by foreigners, they pout and complain before moving to the Philippines or some other shit country where they'll be treated as special.

So yeah, again, you are a liar and a piece of shit. Also, fuck Japan, but that's a whole other discussion.

> [watteau](#comment_20_1AM6ZY48ErJLzU89E7wPVjxoqyWuFnk33o): Great Britain has a moral obligation to take an interest in the welfare of the Hong Kong citizens.

You're right. They should help the PLA denounce all of these dickwads causing trouble for the working men and women of Hong Kong.

> [hdidnothingwrong](#comment_7_1LW31sbmLZebhhgTx2bhzeUNYbZ5cYnBfe): If you are not jealous why do you sound like an r/happa or asianmasculinity poster?

I don't know, maybe it's because my two boys are Chinese and I don't like the idea of a bunch of faggots, faggots from countries that are actively letting themselves be destroyed through their own cuckoldry, hating on them. Maybe I like how China protects itself from the liberal bullshit that I think is destroying my people and I'm not about to stand by while the West vilifies them and tries to shove this cancer down their throats. 

I don't know why I feel this strong impulse to defend China, my adopted home, but maybe it has something to do with that.

> [watteau](#comment_55_1AM6ZY48ErJLzU89E7wPVjxoqyWuFnk33o): https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/av/world-asia-china-49317261/hong-kong-protests-violence-erupts-in-train-stations [...]

Or don't block escalators. Fuck them, I hope the pellets hit them in their little shriveled nuts.

> [nicehat](#comment_4_1LPjWhB47YZwaWoSQH1d2tnj2E3JnMU2cw): Stirring up shit in HK is one of the few things that the seeeyeayyyyyy is doing that is legit what they were created for lol. I like that china exists but they really need to stay in their place.

The West blew it. Do you really want to fuck up China, one of the last places where men control shit, so the whole world will be under the influence of Cuckywood? Be smart, jump ship. The United Faggots of America are doomed.

> [nicehat](#comment_5_1LPjWhB47YZwaWoSQH1d2tnj2E3JnMU2cw): I see your point I am just not willing to concede that the US is that far gone yet. As for china there are better patriarchal cultures to model after if it cam to that.

https://thesocietypages.org/socimages/files/2012/11/117.jpg

Read it and weep. Also, remember half of that 47% projection for 2050 are women. Throw in all the white knights and social justice warriors and think long and hard about what your endgame is and what you get for blocking China. 

Once I learnt Chinese, I fit in here like white on rice. They value education, they value hard work, they value reason and logic, they value basically everything the West did up till the point the West decided it was more important to embrace diversity and empower the women than to encourage critical thinkers and hard workers.

Plus, I think of it like this: what are you fighting for? Your people, your blood, right? In the U.S. it's taught that authority is an enemy, that smart white men are always the villains, and that being a hard worker or a good students makes you a loser. It's like some bizarro world. My blood is with me, and it came with me to China and it runs through the veins of my Chinese sons. My blood is now Chinese blood and it's going to thrive. That's how I see it.

> [nicehat](#comment_6_1LPjWhB47YZwaWoSQH1d2tnj2E3JnMU2cw): 

Yeah, I've met a few Poles and Hungarians over here. They're alright. Besides Chinese, most of my friends are Slavs; Russians and Ukrainians, or Brits. Good folk. The Americans that come to China are generally faggots; such as this one cunt here who was arguing that only whites could be racist (she was white, obviously).

As for Balkanization, I think it will never be allowed to happen. In the next twenty years or so, America will have it's last White male president. After that, the country and military will be controlled by leaders that will need to use you as a means of keeping the GDP acceptable. Read about Catalonia in Spain. 

The obsession for the far East, that's more a Japanese thing. China is like Detroit in its heyday; industrial and with opportunities to get a good job. Japan is like L.A., full of faggots. They attract different types. I never planned to marry a Chinese nor settle here; things played out that way, but I just came for a job.

But about the cutting bait, I don't think it will ever just be an obvious moment. It'll happen slowly over decades. In-fact, it seems to me, the water in the pan is already at a boil.

1565638539_1Hb5zuymuNq9rhYhhoYuAPGMXpxsp.body:
I think all governance is inherently unstable. In any system, a few player will, whether through skill or circumstance, come to dominate the game. As the players that control the wealth can naturally buy power, they will seek to protect themselves and their winnings. As the cycle repeats, other players slowly find themselves locked out of being able to play and win, that is, of obtaining true upward mobility. Eventually, the vast majority of people realize they are by then slaves to the elite and set about to change the system (possibly through violence), once again, into one in which they have the potential to win the game. Then, the it all repeats. 

At-least, that's how I see it.
And communism? The same, except skip immediately to the slavery part.

> [fuhrer](#comment_5_17FPf2gMpv4fcnV5dRnKqj56JVagtkGNSF): I was waiting in line at the grocery store and an annoying nigger was behind me raping to his violent rap music he was listening to on his cell phone speaker.

I would have found it quite annoying if someone was raping my behind as well.

I think it is safe to say that whites are inherently more intelligent than sub-Saharans. Northern Africans, such has the Moors are not "black people". In-fact, northern Africa is the birth-place of Western civilization. Ashkenazi Jews, a Semitic people related to North Africans with European admixture have been ranked the highest I.Q. ethnicity many times at around 116. Sub-Saharans have I.Q. ratings between 60 and 80 with the later scores being from those trying to disprove they have a low I.Q. and despite their inherent bias, still coming up with only 80.

Now, does any of this imply that they are less human or less deserving of equality and fair treatment? I definitely think not. However, I do have a problem with glorifying thug culture. In-fact, I think it has been Hollywood and popular music that has perpetuated this culture onto the black American man. They've been fed that to be black they have to be thugs. They've been fed a hatred of selling out or being an "Uncle Tom". These ideas, I do not believe, came from within but were seeded to them and re-enforced to sell them as "the other" in music and film.

Mesopotamia and Ancient Egypt have the earliest recorded civilizations in the Western world. Greece continued their legacy before the torch passed to Rome and finally to the Germanic world. The Greek alphabet is derived from Phoenician which is a Semitic alphabet from Lebanon that was itself derived from Egyptian hieroglyphs... from... Northern Africa... So, yeah.

The problem is that our Western model of civilization doesn't fit with their inherent natures. Their reproductive strategy and our own is fundamentally different in one extremely important regard: family structure.

Blacks, whether "oppressed" in the Americas or from royal families in Africa, all have certain traits in common in choosing a mate. Have you noticed their taste for large women, their taste for strong women, for financially independent women? Why? Well, those traits make perfect sense if you intend to mate with a female and then leave and not help raise the resultant child. A big woman must have food resources, a strong woman can protect her offspring and independent women will not need your help raising a child.

Whites, Asians and Arabs on the other hand also generally share a certain taste in women: thin, dependent and physically weaker than ourselves. Why? We enter into a contract with them whereby we provide protection and support and they offer exclusive access to their vaginas and commitment to maintaining our households. 

Western and Eastern society both relied on this model. We rear our children with attention and the division of labour between man and woman has allowed us to improve our lots from one generation to the next. With this advantage, blacks have no hope of competing in our Western and Eastern civilizations. It's sad but true.

Reminds me of a buddy of mine. He was going on and on about how Jews control everything. I asked him why don't the white supremacists get together and help each other take over Hollywood, the media, et cetera. He said it's impossible, the Jews are too smart and it's too late.

I stopped him looked him dead in the eye and asked what the hell he was doing in China; he should be in Israel finding a Jewish wife considering how much respect he has for them. He walked out and hasn't spoken with me since...

> [aspidochelone](#comment_58_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): I have seen two stories in which a father and daughter were prosecuted for incest.  There is no doubt in my mind that a father who takes advantage of his daughter, even one who is nominally over 18 and an "adult", is committing an extreme abuse of power that can be criminally penalized.  The notion of prosecuting the daughter utterly sickens me, even before her confinement to a location leaves her vulnerable to murder.  (Katie Pladl)  To me, prosecuting her is the same sickness as laws against homosexuality, and giving her baby, if she had one, a special exemption from abortion laws meant to preserve human life is to say it is an untermensch that should be exterminated for genetic inferiority.  Yes, the risk of genetic disease in incestuously conceived infants is much higher.  But those babies who DON'T have a genetic disease have had their DNA "wrung out", so to speak, and we now know they don't carry harmful recessive genes in full randomly chosen one-fourth of their genome. [...]

Yeah, I also find the whole concept pretty disturbing. However, I don't believe it is the power dynamic that offends, more an instinctual repulsion to the idea of mating with your own offspring. For example, a man, in sleeping with a slave of his, doesn't elicit any of the raw disgust that the concept of incest does for me. I think it's simply evolution telling us that we'll fuck up our offspring and lower their reproductive fitness.

> [aspidochelone](#comment_63_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): @iloveguac:  two recessive alleles for genetic disease need to "meet up" in order to kill the unlucky inheritor and remove themselves from the gene pool.  Incest makes more of them meet up, but this is something that would have happened anyway at some point.  So if you assume we're going back to the Stone Age, nothing of value is lost.  If you think we are headed to gene therapy utopia in two generations, maybe it's a nasty thing to do.  But even if it is a nasty thing to do ... how does it compare to old men siring babies (higher mutation rate) or old women delivering them (more Down syndrome)?

It's a numbers game. I think that's why historically cousin luvin' was fairly acceptable, incest between siblings was looked down upon and incest between parent and offspring has always been considered sickening. Parents and offspring share 50% of their chromosomes. 

Also, old men siring babies has never been a problem.

> [aspidochelone](#comment_68_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): Parents: AB CD -> children AC AD BC BD.  Dad shares 50% of genome (A or B).  But children also share 50% on average (AC shares A with AC, AD and C with AC, BC: note you have to count AC-AC as a possibility because there's nothing to keep the random passage of genes from repeating)  So both parent-child and brother-sister are "first order relatives".  Parents are only more sickening because of the abuse of power and abandonment of the parent's role, not genetics.

While it is possible for siblings to be 100% related, it is also possible for them to be 0%. I think appearance would be one indicator and I'd find a sexual pairing of siblings that looked similar to be more off-putting than a pairing that were very different in appearance. 

What are your feelings about Woody Allen marrying his adopted daughter? He was in a parent-role, but then abandoned it for a romantic role. If we assume that there was no abuse when she was a minor, do you still feel it is contemptible?

1565868212_1LdgxNSynzpd5Vyi3Ej12adEuWbo1.body:
I previously subscribed to this same view, but am not so certain anymore. While there are more abortions happening amongst the poor, they also have a much higher reproductive rate in general. In other words, a poor woman may get pregnant ten times, abort eight of them and still have twice the children of a middle income woman who has been pregnant twice and aborted once. 

I think it is best to consider class much as how a racist considers race: there is very little mixing between income stratum. Also, their lot in life is largely owed to their genetic potential. So, the priority should be on reducing abortions for the in-group high-income women and also increasing their rate of reproduction in general. If the out-group women have more children as a result, it does not affect the in-group negatively and is a source of exploitable labor.

> [shiok](#comment_3_1D8TyrF6WYHSWMPSwRCmDR868WxaTihFjA): Everybody has the right to abort. Every parent has the right to not let his/her child suffer because of foretold illness. No parent in this world would ever want to send his/her child off before they do. And no parent would want to worry for their child's survival after they pass away. Not to say parents willing to risk it are not doing the RIGHT thing. Because this is the point, there is no RIGHT thing, it is only a choice.  [...]

What about parents that abandon, traffic, murder or do other selfish things to their children for their own gain? Will it be a no true Scotsman reply? I disagree with you and say, yes, some parents simply don't want children because they think it'll cramp their style or put a hole in their pockets. 

If the child has been confirmed to carry some disease, I agree that to end it may be the best choice.
What about so called "After Birth Abortion"? Is that my right as well? Where's the red line? And where's my hairline?

1565880498_1CyoFuqywpEgKYPHjQUui3TJQuEDq.body:
> [theecollector](#comment_37_15rMfe5FVSWwMffJvTpBUq9dFiLQPNxkuU): ok i just a few mins ago came to this realization... hear me out and give feedback!! [...]

That's how to government here used to take care of problems, sweep it under the mat till everyone forgot about it and it was taken care of. They'd tell the papers and news stations not to mention this or that. Or to just report facts and not take a stand on the issue. I mean, yeah, it works. Surprisingly, they've started to change recently. I think television has a way of radicalizing people. When the television avoids taking sides on major issues, it leaves people to consult their family and friends. And, I think, this creates more nuanced and natural feelings toward issues.

But yeah, that's media censorship. 1566012765_1Mn4SpXCYTbc1j1fzSz2YgiXy8ue4.body:
https://study.com/academy/lesson/average-age-of-marriage-throughout-history.html

"Still, while marriageable age was rather young, not everyone married at that exact age. For instance, in ancient Rome, a society who did keep extensive written records, someone was considered eligible for marriage at age 14. For many families, this was the perfect time to arrange a marriage for your daughter and son, but for some families, there could be an advantage to waiting. If a child had political, social, or economic opportunities, there could be advantages to holding off on their marriage for a few years until they achieved a greater political, social, or economic position. So, ages of marriage varied widely across the modern world, but on average were still young by our standards. "

"One of the first times we see a major concern about the age difference between couples is in England in 1275 CE. In a law prohibiting rape, it was also declared illegal to 'ravish a maiden' within a certain age, with or without her permission. That age was determined by jurist Sir Edward Coke to mean the age of marriage, which at the time was 12. This still seems young, but it's one of the first times we see a strict age limit placed on marriage or sexual interaction. This was the beginning of our modern association between the age of marriage and age of consent."

Age of Consent in European & American History. Portugal, Spain, Denmark and the Swiss canons, initially set the age of consent at 10-12 years and then raised it to between 13 and 16 years in the second half of the 19th century. Historically, the English common law set the age of consent to range from 10- 12."

I think it comes down to female empowerment. The earlier a female is married off, the less empowered she will be. In our modern cuck society, the need for female empowerment is axiomatic, it's a-priori. As such, anything that would threaten that empowerment is deemed socially offensive to the highest degree. White knights are here to threaten you with death should you question this.
